task.name: v.to.db
task.description: Populates database values from vector features.
task.keywords: vectorial, base de datos, tabla de atributos

parameter.name: map
parameter.description: Nombre del mapa vectorial de entrada.

parameter.name: type
parameter.label: Tipo de elemento
parameter.description: For coor valid point/centroid, for length valid line/boundary

parameter.name: layer
parameter.label: Layer number (write to)
parameter.description: Es posible conectar un solo mapa vectorial con múltiples tablas de una base de datos. Este número determina qué tabla se ha de usar.

parameter.name: qlayer
parameter.label: Query layer number (read from)
parameter.description: Es posible conectar un solo mapa vectorial con múltiples tablas de una base de datos. Este número determina qué tabla se ha de usar.

value.name: cat
value.description: insert new row for each category if doesn't exist yet

value.name: compact
value.description: compactness of an area, calculated as compactness = perimeter / (2 * sqrt(PI * area))

value.name: fd
value.description: fractal dimension of boundary defining a polygon, calculated as fd = 2 * (log(perimeter) / log(area))

value.name: count
value.description: number of features for each category

value.name: start
value.description: line/boundary starting point coordinates, X,Y or X,Y,Z

value.name: end
value.description: line/boundary end point coordinates, X,Y or X,Y,Z

value.name: sides
value.description: categories of areas on the left and right side of the boundary, 'qlayer' is used for area category

value.name: query
value.description: result of a database query for all records of the geometry(or geometries) from table specified by 'qlayer' option

value.name: slope
value.description: slope steepness of vector line or boundary

value.name: sinuous
value.description: line sinuousity, calculated as line length / distance between end points

parameter.name: columns
parameter.description: Nombre de la(s) columna(s) de atributos.

parameter.name: qcolumn
parameter.label: Name of attribute column used for 'query' option

flag.name: c
flag.description: En modo impresión imprime totales para las opciones: longitud,área,cuenta
